name: Strawberry Banana Cream Pie V2
description: Strawberry Banana Cream Pie with Graham Crust. This is my first recipe as a newbie DIYer. It's quite simple (as i'm just starting out) however I'm welcome to criticisms and suggestions for improvement. In V2 i've doubled to Cheesecake (Graham) Crust to 3% and instead of 8% TFA Strawberry, its now 4% TFA Strawberry and 4% Strawberry (Ripe). Tastes pretty good to me after an overnight steep, but looking forward to trying this after a week or 2.
author: FraserRC

reviews.text: Made this and forgot about it until a 3 week steep.  Very nice and definitely worth making again... but  I will tweak the next batch to my palate.  Thanks for the recipe!
Very tasty. I like it. My favorite banana vape so far.
I mixed this, and let it steep over night.  I really like it.  Was wondering if the strawberry flavor will come out more in a another week.  Or should I add more strawberry.  Very good though.
